entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Fog spreading inland. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
